game_state.hpp

3 #include <spdlog/spdlog.h>

5 #include <rj_common/field_dimensions.hpp>
6 #include <rj_common/referee_enums.hpp>
7 #include <rj_common/time.hpp>
8 #include <rj_constants/constants.hpp>

10 #include <rj_geometry/geometry_conversions.hpp>
11 #include <rj_geometry/point.hpp>

13 #include <rj_msgs/msg/match_state.hpp>
14 #include <rj_msgs/msg/play_state.hpp>
15 
16 struct PlayState {
17 public:
18  using Msg = rj_msgs::msg::PlayState;
19 
20  enum State {
21  Halt, // Robots must not move
22  Stop, // Robots must stay 500mm away from ball
23  Setup, // Robots not on starting team must stay 500mm away from ball
24  Ready, // A robot on the starting team may kick the ball
25  Playing, // Normal play
26  PenaltyPlaying // Like normal play, but robots (except goalie and striker) should not do
27  // anything.
28  };
29 
30  // Types of restarts
31  enum Restart { None, Kickoff, Direct, Indirect, Penalty, Placement };
32 
33  [[nodiscard]] State state() const { return state_; }
34  [[nodiscard]] bool is_restart() const { return restart_ != Restart::None; }
35  [[nodiscard]] Restart restart() const { return restart_; }
36  [[nodiscard]] bool is_our_restart() const { return is_restart() && our_restart_; }
37  [[nodiscard]] bool is_their_restart() const { return is_restart() && our_restart_; }
38  [[nodiscard]] bool is_halt() const { return state() == State::Halt; }
39  [[nodiscard]] bool is_stop() const { return state() == State::Stop; }
40  [[nodiscard]] bool is_setup() const { return state() == State::Setup; }
41  [[nodiscard]] bool is_ready() const { return state() == State::Ready; }
42  [[nodiscard]] bool is_playing() const { return state() == State::Playing; }
43  [[nodiscard]] bool is_penalty_playing() const { return state() == State::PenaltyPlaying; }
44  [[nodiscard]] bool is_kickoff() const { return restart() == Restart::Kickoff; }
45  [[nodiscard]] bool is_direct() const { return restart() == Restart::Direct; }
46  [[nodiscard]] bool is_indirect() const { return restart() == Restart::Indirect; }
47  [[nodiscard]] bool is_penalty() const { return restart() == Restart::Penalty; }
48  [[nodiscard]] bool is_placement() const { return restart() == Restart::Placement; }
49 
50  [[nodiscard]] std::optional<rj_geometry::Point> ball_placement_point() const {
51  if (is_placement()) {
52  return ball_placement_point_;
53  }
54  return std::nullopt;
55  }
56 
57  [[nodiscard]] bool wait_for_kick() const { return state_ == Ready; }
58 
59  void set_our_restart(bool our_restart) {
60  if (is_restart()) {
61  our_restart_ = our_restart;
62  }
63  }
64 
69  [[nodiscard]] PlayState advanced_from_kick() const {
70  if (wait_for_kick()) {
71  if (restart_ == Restart::Penalty) {
72  return PlayState::penalty_playing(our_restart_);
73  }
74  return PlayState::playing();
75  }
76  return *this;
77  }
78 
83  [[nodiscard]] PlayState advanced_from_normal_start() const {
84  if (state_ == State::Setup) {
85  if (restart_ == Restart::Kickoff) {
86  return PlayState::ready_kickoff(our_restart_);
87  }
88 
89  if (restart_ == Restart::Penalty) {
90  return PlayState::ready_penalty(our_restart_);
91  }
92 
93  SPDLOG_WARN(
94  "Got a normal start command but restart is {} (normal start should only be "
95  "necessary in kickoff/penalty)",
96  restart_);
97  }
98  return *this;
99  }
100 
104  [[nodiscard]] PlayState opposite_team() const {
105  return PlayState(state_, restart_, is_restart() && !our_restart_, ball_placement_point_);
106  }
107 
112  [[nodiscard]] PlayState opposite_team(bool do_invert) const {
113  return do_invert ? opposite_team() : *this;
114  }
115 
120  [[nodiscard]] PlayState with_transform(const rj_geometry::TransformMatrix& transform) const {
121  return PlayState(state_, restart_, our_restart_,
122  is_placement() ? transform * ball_placement_point_ : rj_geometry::Point());
123  }
124 
125  static PlayState halt() { return PlayState(State::Halt, Restart::None, false, {}); }
126  static PlayState stop() { return PlayState(State::Stop, Restart::None, false, {}); }
127  static PlayState setup_kickoff(bool ours) {
128  return PlayState(State::Setup, Restart::Kickoff, ours, {});
129  }
130  static PlayState ready_kickoff(bool ours) {
131  return PlayState(State::Ready, Restart::Kickoff, ours, {});
132  }
133  static PlayState setup_penalty(bool ours) {
134  return PlayState(State::Setup, Restart::Penalty, ours, {});
135  }
136  static PlayState ready_penalty(bool ours) {
137  return PlayState(State::Ready, Restart::Penalty, ours, {});
138  }
139  static PlayState ready_direct(bool ours) {
140  return PlayState(State::Ready, Restart::Direct, ours, {});
141  }
142  static PlayState ready_indirect(bool ours) {
143  return PlayState(State::Ready, Restart::Indirect, ours, {});
144  }
145  static PlayState ball_placement(bool ours, rj_geometry::Point point) {
146  return PlayState(State::Stop, Restart::Placement, ours, point);
147  }
148  static PlayState playing() { return PlayState(State::Playing, Restart::None, false, {}); }
149  static PlayState penalty_playing(bool ours) {
150  return PlayState(State::PenaltyPlaying, Restart::Penalty, ours, {});
151  }
152 
153  bool operator==(const PlayState& other) const {
154  return state() == other.state() && restart() == other.restart() &&
155  is_our_restart() == other.is_our_restart() &&
156  ball_placement_point() == other.ball_placement_point();
157  }
158 
159  bool operator!=(const PlayState& other) const { return !(*this == other); }
160 
161  std::string get_human_readout() const {
162  std::string ours_string = is_our_restart() ? "OUR" : "THEIR";
163  std::string setup_string = is_setup() ? "SETUP" : "READY";
164  switch (restart_) {
165  case Kickoff:
166  return fmt::format("{} KICKOFF : {}", ours_string, setup_string);
167  case Direct:
168  return fmt::format("{} DIRECT", ours_string);
169  case Indirect:
170  return fmt::format("{} INDIRECT", ours_string);
171  case Penalty:
172  return fmt::format("{} PENALTY : {}", ours_string, setup_string);
173  case Placement:
174  return fmt::format("{} PLACEMENT({:.2f}, {:.2f})", ours_string,
175  ball_placement_point_.x(), ball_placement_point_.y());
176  default:
177  case None:
178  break;
179  }
180 
181  switch (state_) {
182  case Halt:
183  return "HALT";
184  case Stop:
185  return "STOP";
186  case Playing:
187  return "PLAYING";
188  case PenaltyPlaying:
189  return "PENALTY_PLAY";
190  default:
191  case Setup:
192  case Ready:
193  // Should have been covered by the restart case!
194  break;
195  }
196 
197  SPDLOG_WARN("Trying to convert invalid game state to string: state is {}, restart is {}",
198  state_, restart_);
199  return "???";
200  }
201 
202 private:
203  friend struct rj_convert::RosConverter<PlayState, rj_msgs::msg::PlayState>;
204 
205  PlayState(State state, Restart restart, bool our_restart,
206  rj_geometry::Point ball_placement_point)
207  : state_{state},
208  restart_{restart},
209  our_restart_{our_restart},
210  ball_placement_point_{ball_placement_point} {}
211 
212  State state_;
213  Restart restart_;
214  bool our_restart_;
215  rj_geometry::Point ball_placement_point_;
216 };
217 
218 struct MatchState {
219 public:
220  using Msg = rj_msgs::msg::MatchState;
221 
222  enum Period { FirstHalf, Halftime, SecondHalf, Overtime1, Overtime2, PenaltyShootout };
223 
224  Period period;
225 
226  // Time in seconds remaining in the current period
227  RJ::Seconds stage_time_left{};
228 
229  std::optional<rj_geometry::Point> ball_placement_point;
230 };
231 
232 namespace rj_convert {
233 
234 template <>
235 struct RosConverter<MatchState::Period, uint8_t> {
236  static uint8_t to_ros(const MatchState::Period& from) { return static_cast<uint8_t>(from); }
237 
238  static MatchState::Period from_ros(const uint8_t from) {
239  return static_cast<MatchState::Period>(from);
240  }
241 };
242 
243 template <>
244 struct RosConverter<MatchState, rj_msgs::msg::MatchState> {
245  static rj_msgs::msg::MatchState to_ros(const MatchState& from) {
246  rj_msgs::msg::MatchState to;
247  convert_to_ros(from.period, &to.period);
248  convert_to_ros(from.stage_time_left, &to.stage_time_left);
249  return to;
250  }
251 
252  static MatchState from_ros(const rj_msgs::msg::MatchState from) {
253  MatchState to;
254  convert_from_ros(from.period, &to.period);
255  convert_from_ros(from.stage_time_left, &to.stage_time_left);
256  return to;
257  }
258 };
259 
260 ASSOCIATE_CPP_ROS(MatchState, MatchState::Msg);
261 
262 template <>
263 struct RosConverter<PlayState::State, uint8_t> {
264  static uint8_t to_ros(const PlayState::State& from) { return static_cast<uint8_t>(from); }
265 
266  static PlayState::State from_ros(const uint8_t from) {
267  return static_cast<PlayState::State>(from);
268  }
269 };
270 
271 template <>
272 struct RosConverter<PlayState::Restart, uint8_t> {
273  static uint8_t to_ros(const PlayState::Restart& from) { return static_cast<uint8_t>(from); }
274 
275  static PlayState::Restart from_ros(const uint8_t from) {
276  return static_cast<PlayState::Restart>(from);
277  }
278 };
279 
280 template <>
281 struct RosConverter<PlayState, rj_msgs::msg::PlayState> {
282  static rj_msgs::msg::PlayState to_ros(const PlayState& from) {
283  rj_msgs::msg::PlayState to;
284  convert_to_ros(from.state(), &to.state);
285  convert_to_ros(from.restart(), &to.restart);
286  convert_to_ros(from.is_our_restart(), &to.our_restart);
287  if (from.ball_placement_point().has_value()) {
288  convert_to_ros(from.ball_placement_point().value(), &to.placement_point);
289  }
290  return to;
291  }
292 
293  static PlayState from_ros(const rj_msgs::msg::PlayState& from) {
294  PlayState::State state = PlayState::State::Halt;
295  convert_from_ros(from.state, &state);
296  PlayState::Restart restart = PlayState::Restart::None;
297  convert_from_ros(from.restart, &restart);
298  return PlayState(state, restart, from.our_restart, convert_from_ros(from.placement_point));
299  }
300 };
301 
302 ASSOCIATE_CPP_ROS(PlayState, PlayState::Msg);
